overview: Surya, who is already owned by someone, goes to Yogyakarta by night bus and sits next to Asti, whom Surya saves from pranksters. Unexpectedly, this meeting with Asti changes Surya's life, both in love and in his relationship with his parents.
tagline: I can make you fall in love with me even if you don't love me
title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
